properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI; New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 2:52PM EST until January 6 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Gale Warning, which is in effect from 1 PM Sunday to 1 AM EST
Monday. The Gale Watch is no longer in effect.

* WINDS...West wind 10 to 15 knots backing southwest towards
daybreak.

* WAVES...3 to 5 feet.

A Gale Watch has also been issued. This Gale Watch is in effect
from Sunday afternoon through late Sunday night.

* WINDS....Southwest wind 15 to 25 knots on Sunday veering west 20
to 30 knots in the afternoon. Gusts up to 35 knot gales.

* WAVES... Waves 3 to 6 feet building to 4 to 10 feet,
occasionally to 13 feet in the afternoon.
properties.instruction:
A Gale Warning means winds of 34 to 47 knots are imminent or
occuring. Operating a vessel in gale conditions requires
experience and properly equipped vessels. It is highly
recommended that mariners without the proper experience seek safe
harbor prior to the onset of gale conditions.

A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SUNDAY TO 1 AM EST MONDAY
